string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Q: What does this app do?
Q: How can I share data?\nWhat can I share?
Q: Can I use one RuuviTag for multiple spaces?
Q: I have another question or have feedback/bug issue.

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: A: In this app, you can add spaces of any area, for example your kitchen, balcony and summer cottage, individually measure data from them and share them among other users.

A: Start by adding spaces from the spaces page. After that, head to measure page and choose which A RuuviTag device is used to measure conditions of selected space. You must add one to each space by clicking the Bluetooth Icon on spaces page or measure page.

A: Head to the measure page. There, you can see your properties and select a space from a property Select a timer symbol from the space list. Add a schedule and when the scheduled measurement is done, click on the finished schedule to get the results. There you can share the results.
A: Yes. However, note that you can\'t save data from two spaces that use the same device at the same time.
A: This app is developed by Mikael Holm and Tiitus Telke of Metropolia University of Applied Sciences as a part of Mobile solutions major program.
